articles.title: Victoria Beckham posts sweet comment under Mia Regan's Instagram snap after Romeo split - The Mirror
articles.description: Former Spice Girls singer Victoria Beckham has showered model Mia Regan with love following her latest Instagram upload after her unexpected split with son Romeo
articles.content:
Romeo Beckham may have split with girlfriend Mia Regan, but his mum has proved that she's still the model's biggest fan.
